news_header: Capricorn Metals has agreed to acquire the Deadman Flat project from Peregrine Gold for AU$1.5 million.
news_original_title: Capricorn Metals to Buy Deadman Flat, Extend Karlawinda Gold Project Tenure
news_text: Capricorn Metals (ASX:CMM, OTC Pink:CRNLF) has entered into an agreement with Peregrine Gold (ASX:PGD) to acquire the Deadman Flat project in Western Australia's Pilbara region. The project covers approximately 270 square kilometers adjacent to Capricorn's Karlawinda gold project. The acquisition will be paid in two installments of AU$750,000, contingent on resource estimates and the decision to start mining operations. This expansion aims to enhance exploration opportunities and ore sourcing for the Karlawinda project, which produced 28,702 ounces of gold in the last quarter. Capricorn plans to conduct various geological surveys and expects to finalize the acquisition by February.
